ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mage weaponry
ygData.msgSnippet: What stein and what book, if I may ask? Mine is level 18 and I am looking for something decent yet affordable to non twinks. THanks ...
ygData.messageBody:
What stein and what book, if I may ask?

Mine is level 18 and I am looking for something decent
yet affordable to non twinks.


THanks
--- Orion <orionv@...> wrote:
> I have a level 22 Mage and he does not carry a
> weapon at all. He carries a Stein and a book. Much
> more useful than any weapon I can find...:>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: kosingigglephitz
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Friday, July 26, 2002 9:27 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Mage weaponry
>
>
> I know that Mages can't really weild a 2 handed
> bastard sword but
> what i was wondering, other than the cheesy
> dagger, what weaponry can
> a Mage Use? Can they use a mace, a club, a better
> dagger at least? I
> tried getting my Mage a parrying dagger but I
> could't equip that
> item.
>
